mdRecord.dcterms:description: Colophon: Excudebant Lugduni Melchior et Gaspar Trechsel fratres, 1538.

Second issue: signatures I-M reset, using larger type for signature marks and with the blocks and text for Job XV and XXXVIII on leaves I1v and I2r, having been transposed with the blocks for Judith X and XIII.
The illustrations are by Hans Holbein the Younger, although the artist is not named.
Preface by François Frellon on verso of title page.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Signatures of François Rasse des Noeux, 1546, Iac. Aug. Thuani, Agnes Darby Parr, and Lucinda Darby Griffith. Bookplates of Edouard Rahir, Baron Dimsdale and Docteur Lucien-Graux. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 338.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Bible, Old Testament--Illustrations.
